daily_take.headline: Maine Democrats Just Made Platner the Frontrunner. Here's Why That Matters.
daily_take.deck: Graham Platner's odds to win the Democratic Senate nomination in Maine jumped 9 points overnight to 76.5%, signaling serious momentum behind the challenger. The 9-point swing suggests recent news broke his way, probably a key endorsement or polling surge. This is a race to watch because it'll test whether Maine's Democratic base rewards establishment backing or hunger for fresh blood.
